job_tasks.phrase: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of developing and running technology, which includes tooling and end-user software, aligning with building and maintaining applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
job_tasks.justification: Defining architecture and making technology choices are fundamental software engineering responsibilities related to the design and structure of software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with development teams to find technical solutions, which falls under software development and integration practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
job_tasks.justification: Developing tools and automation for users (artists in this case) is a direct software development task, focused on creating functional software.

job_tasks.phrase: Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the operational aspects of software development, including building, testing, and deploying changes, which aligns with CI/CD and pipeline management.

job_tasks.phrase: Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline, pick up enhancements and implement directly.
job_tasks.justification: Documenting software and implementing enhancements are standard software development practices. Training users on the developed tools also falls under the broader scope of software delivery.

soft_skills.phrase: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with various teams (CTO, technical, artistic), indicating a need for strong teamwork and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams
soft_skills.justification: Highlights collaboration with specific development and technical teams, emphasizing teamwork and shared technical approaches.
Indicates working closely with artists to understand their needs and develop tools, requiring communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline
soft_skills.justification: This involves communicating technical information (documentation) and providing training, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
soft_skills.justification: Taking ownership of defining, developing, and running a new version of technology implies innovation and a sense of responsibility for the outcome.

soft_skills.phrase: Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
soft_skills.justification: Defining future architecture and making technology choices demonstrates leadership, innovation, and ownership of the technology's direction.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on software development, pipeline management, and integration within a creative technology context (rendering technology). There are no mentions of AI/ML models, Generative AI, or related tasks (like model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG). The tasks described fall squarely within Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering), specifically 1.A.1 (Software Development & Integration) and 1.A.2 (Operations & MLOps). Therefore, the most appropriate profile is 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on rendering technology pipelines and software development. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward and highly confident.
